product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket - Men's Extended Size
long_description: The North Face Denali men's extended-size fleece jacket is a comfortable, all-around fleece for snowy climates. Wear it as a mid layer or outer layer, depending on the day.
short_description: The North Face Denali men's extended-size fleece jacket is a comfortable, all-around fleece for snowy climates. Wear it as a mid layer or outer layer, depending on the day.
